title: 23: The Four Winds
itunes:title: The Four Winds
description: MERCH: https://shopmorningtoast.com/collections/the-readheads In this episode of The Readheads Book Club, the ladies are recapping and discussing The Four Winds by Kristin Hannah, a historical fiction novel set in the Great Depression era. The ladies are sharing their thoughts and opinions on the novel and answering all of your questions. Plus, they're sharing their casting choices of a screen adaptation of The Four Winds. As always they are also sharing the other books they read this month and what they thought of them. The next book is Dana's choice and she chose Detransition, Baby by Torrey Peters. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com  The overall Readheads Rating for The Four Winds is 3.675 stars.
